item.title: RevoBank Fintech Analysis | Part 3: Propensity Modelling
item.description: Situation This the last part of RevoBank analysis, we develop machine learning with propensity modelling using logit regression. As a Data Analyst at RevoBank, I developed a propensity model to predict customers likely to adopt the new PayLater installment feature for a targeted promotion campaign. Backround RevoBank launched a 3-month pilot for a PayLater installment feature on RevoShop transactions. The pilot demonstrated potential to increase credit card usage. To further boost activation, RevoBank proposed Project Contact - contacting customers to offer rewards for trying PayLater.
